abstract: Donald J. Trump and a group of bondholders beat out Carl C. Icahn to gain control of Trump Entertainment Resorts and its three Atlantic City casinos, as the company prepares to exit bankruptcy court for the third time.
snippet: Donald J. Trump and a group of bondholders beat out Carl C. Icahn to gain control of Trump Entertainment Resorts and its three Atlantic City casinos, as the company prepares to exit bankruptcy court for the third time.
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump is hoping the third time will be the charm.

headline.main: Trump Beats Out Icahn for Control of Casinos
